articles.content:
Congratulations to Egyptian President
    Pyongyang, May 6 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il on May 2 sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Hosni Mubarak, Chairman of the Egyptian National Democratic Party, President of the Arab Republic of Egypt and commander-in-chief of its armed forces, on the occasion of his 75th birthday.
 The message said:    
 Please accept my warm congratulations to you on your 75th birthday. Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you good health and happiness and also greater success in your work for development and prosperity of the country and peace and security in the Mideast Arab region.
